post_title: 1909 T206 Harry Hinchman Graded ISA 3 - For Sale or Trade
post_content:
1909 T 206 Piedmont 350 - Harry Hinchman - Toledo Mudhens (ML)

$85 includes tracked shipping to your CONUS Address

OR

Would trade or trade/cash (if needed)  for your T206 Common (graded 2 - 4) that I can use in my set.

Thanks for looking and let me know on any Questions
